summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 BMW 328I. WHILE MAKING A RIGHT TURN AT APPROXIMATELY 5 MPH, THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY STALLED AND THE CHECK ENGINE WARNING INDICATOR ILLUMINATED. THE CONTACT RESTARTED THE VEHICLE, BUT THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE CONTACT LOST ALL POWER STEERING ABILITY BOTH TIMES THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT TAKEN THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE. THE VIN WAS UNKNOWN. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 105,000.
